articles.author: Jesse Wells
articles.title: Fentanyl-related deaths drop by nearly 50% in Marion County - FOX 59 Indianapolis
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS — The number of Hoosiers dying from drug poisoning is going down.  Preliminary numbers in Marion County show that 2024 saw a huge decline in fentanyl-related overdose deaths. According to the coroner’s office, fentanyl-related overdose deaths dro…
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS — The number of Hoosiers dying from drug poisoning is going down.  Preliminary numbers in Marion County show that 2024 saw a huge decline in fentanyl-related overdose deaths.
